scripts.dev: npm run services:up && npx concurrently "npm run backend:dev" "npm run frontend:dev" --names "BACK,FRONT" --prefix-colors "green,blue"
scripts.dev:back: npm run services:up && npm run backend:dev
scripts.test: npx concurrently "npm run backend:test" "npm run frontend:test" --names "BACK-TEST,FRONT-TEST" --prefix-colors "magenta,cyan"
scripts.test:watch: npx concurrently "npm run backend:test:watch" "npm run frontend:test:watch" --names "BACK-WATCH,FRONT-WATCH"
